Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Islandia Drive, north of the Kimbler Locksmith.
Room.LongDescription: The Kimbler Family Locksmith provides some of the best, most secure storage chests and safes in the land. They are also well known for being able to open almost any lock in the world. On the north side of the road is the North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa, where you can go for a short break in some warm, natural springs.
